You must never forget that Satan, disguised as an angel of light, is always ready to encourage anything that would lead to a loss of confidence in our denominational literature. He would be pleased to keep many minds employed in picking flaws in publications that God has blessed.--Letter 70, 1910, pp. 1, 2. (To Elder A. G. Daniells, August 11, 1910.) 

Released May 23, 1975.
